channel.title: 639 Getting started
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I'm quite annoyed that this doesn't just work for me and I'm hoping that someone could help me with this. So, my problem is that I downloaded a 639 Source and Client. When I run the source it just runs, and when I run the client it does pop up but it doesn't seem to connect. However I've been looking in the client.java file to find the IP it connects to (at least, that's what I used to do on my old 317 source) but I can't seem to find it. When I open my client it's also giving this error:
[code]error_game_js5connect[/code]
Any help will be appreciated.
